title: A King So Cruel
description: Once upon a time, we were best friendsOur families ruled side by side. I lived in a castle. Nathanial was everything to me.Then came the great betrayal and I fled to the mountains with my father and our loyal followers.Now he is the cruel king.And I am the traitorâ€™s daughter.For the last ten years, he left us alone except for the odd skirmish. I used to dream of a day when we would forget the sins of our fathers and restore peace to our cursed kingdom. I used to dream of a time when Nathanial and I would be together again.Then something changed.He took everything from me.I will never forget.I will never forgive.The boy I once knew is gone.The girl I once was is gone.Now he rages a great war and intends to claim me as his prize.He wants a queen.I want revenge.Let the games begin.The Cursed Kingdom is a dark, thrilling and sexy fantasy series perfect for anyone who likes their romance steaming hot and twisted with an anti-hero.
author: Ellie Cassidy
